Thomas Gutwa
============

[City Council](https://www.keenetx.com/Directory.aspx?DID=14)  
Title: Council Member, Place II  
Phone: [817-641-3336 Ext. 105](tel:8176413336;105)
  
[Email Council Member Gutwa](mailto:tgutwa@keenetx.com)
